participant_1.background:
I'm looking for a home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.
I take my mother chocolate milk shakes when I visit her in the hospital.
i am a small business owner.
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.

participant_2.background:
I've been learning to cope with my OCD better and it's been helping me to live a more fulfilling life.
I want to learn how to use my George Foreman grill to make delicious meals.
I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I have never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands.

content.text: Hello! It's going well, thanks for asking! How's yours?
I'm looking for a new home that is close to grocery stores so I can take advantage of my couponing skills.
That's a great idea! I love couponing too. I've been learning to cope with my OCD better and it's been helping me to live a more fulfilling life.
That's great to hear! I'm glad that you're able to cope with your OCD. I'm a small business owner and I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays.

That's amazing! I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work. I like to read fairytales on the weekends because they are a great escape from the stresses of everyday life.
I love reading fairytales too! I think they're so magical. I've never been to a fortune teller, as I believe that my future is in my own hands.
That's a great attitude to have! I'm glad that you're so positive.
Thank you! I try to be. I'm just a happy person, I guess!
I'm glad to hear that! You seem like a really nice person.
Thank you! You seem nice too!
